div1.head: Unknown Soldier to Friend July 30/61
div1.p:
I received your kind and
well composed letter last
night it did not come to
Portland in time for me to receive
it before we left so it was
here to me I also received one
from Win & your Mother &
was very glad to here fraome you
all. And I now seat myself
under a larg peach tree on the
bank of the Potomac to right
you a few lines, to let you
know that I am well and hope
that these few lines will find
you the same I have just
arrived from Washington City
Started this morning at half past
2 two oclock to exchange some
muskets for rifels.

We are a camping on Georgetown
hights on the bank of the
Potomac River at the end of
the chane Bridge Virgina is
on the other side of the
of the river we are in Mariland
I over in virgina as often
as every other day we go in
Scouting partys every night
we have got as many as forty
horses two beef oxen & one
cow since we ben here the
way we go out one Company
goes out at a time and the others
companyes will send out
ten or twelve out of each
Co making a bout two hundred
we lay in the woods long
side of the roads there is
a good meny union men
there they will tell us where
to find the rebels that cames
to the houses to stop night
then we will go in Squads about
ten or fiften in a Squad
and take them & there horses
if we can catch them we
have got a number of rebels
here that we have taken we
use them well but keep a
strong gard over them
I have ben over there in
the day time have ben all
round went in the houses
when we go over there we
have a rifel & a revolver
& a Boie knife in our belts
they have fired in to our
pickets gards in the night
once or twice doing no damage
except puting a ball through
one mans hand. the weather
is very warm here now. this
is the hotest month in the
year it is diferent from the
weather down East it is hot
all the time the nights is
very cool we all stand the
warm weather very well I think
that I can go into the field
and due more work in one
day then two the best nigroes
there is out here George
it is a beautiful country
